definitions.definition: Progress which has been made ; also, speed .
Loose earth , rubble , etc., on the surface of a quarry which must be removed before digging can begin ; rid-work .

main_definition: ( rare ) Progress which has been made ; also, speed .
secondary_definitions: ( mining ) Loose earth , rubble , etc., on the surface of a quarry which must be removed before digging can begin ; rid-work .
